reviewtext: Not much else to say other than these are very compact, light, and have good clear glass.  I bought mine to help look at rifle targets ~100 yards out that are not so easy for me to see through a 3x rifle scope and they work fine.  Width adjustment is sufficient for those with big noggins.Nice and light to toss in the range bag, and they come with a sufficiently little carry pouch.
summary: Nice clear optics, very compact size, competitively priced.
